definition: To act as a substitute or representative for someone or something, often in a professional or official capacity, such as attending a meeting or speaking on behalf of another person or organization. It can also refer to the act of advocating or defending a particular position or viewpoint.

examples.german: Ich vertrete dich bei der Besprechung.
examples.english: I will represent you at the meeting.

examples.german: Sie vertritt die Interessen ihrer Kunden.
examples.english: She represents the interests of her clients.

examples.german: Der Anwalt wird den Angeklagten vor Gericht vertreten.
examples.english: The lawyer will represent the defendant in court.
